errors.loginProblem:
There is a problem with login to the server.
Please reload the game.
errors.serverDown: Please note that due to routine maintenance on part of our system we are unable to launch any new game at the moment. Please check back at regular intervals to continue playing. Apologies for any inconvenience caused.
errors.geoBlocked: Unfortunately, this game is currently unavailable to players from your region. You can still play our other games, so visit the Lobby and take a look at what else we can offer.
errors.gameDisabled: Unfortunately, this game is currently unavailable. You can still play our other games, so visit the Lobby and take a look at what else we can offer.
errors.loggedOnOtherMachine: Your session has been dropped since this user is logged in from another place.
errors.lowBalance: Your account balance is too low to place the bet.
errors.lobbyAccountBalanceLimitation: Currently, you cannot play for real-money stakes because you don't have enough money in your account or due to other limitations. You can make a deposit now or play for fun.

errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg1:
Sorry, we could not validate your location. You have to be inside New Jersey to play our games. Currently gameplay is only possible via Wi-Fi connection. Please log in after activating Wi-Fi connection.

If you still see this message inside New Jersey please visit our FAQs.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg2:
Sorry, we cannot allow you to proceed. Our system indicates that you are in a region that does not allow this operation. This is due to regulatory restrictions.

If you are seeing this message in the state of New Jersey, we recommend you visit our FAQs and troubleshoot.
errors.USNJ_GeoLocMsg3: We are unable to confirm your physical location as being in New Jersey. By giving us your cell number and registering for location services, it is far more likely we will be successful in locating you and allowing you to play on our site.
errors.USNJ_SessionTimeLimit: You asked us to set a daily time limit for you and you've reached it for today. Thanks for playing. You'll be welcome to come back and play again tomorrow.
